name: Lumis 4-Piece Modular Snow White Performance Fabric Sectional Sofa
details: Upholstered in a charcoal performance velvet, large-scale sectional sits low to the ground for modern appeal. The plush silhouette features pillow-like detached cushions with broad armrests that can serve as a relaxed perch for socializing. Sectional pieces can be configured to suit your space. CB2 exclusive.
